author: OpenAI Codex
install_msg: Thanks for adding aiuserOAI-Codex. Install cogs like gpt5assistant with [p]cog install aiuserOAI-Codex gpt5assistant, then [p]load gpt5assistant.
name: aiuserOAI-Codex
description: Cogs powered by OpenAI Responses API. Includes gpt5assistant with native tools and image support.
end_user_data_statement: This repository contains cogs that may send user content and files to OpenAI for processing. See each cog's info.json for details.
